resources.string: \n The mission of ViMux is to provide a streaming video and audio through creating channels. \n Also, user can watch or listen video and audio anytime. We aim to provide a simple interface so that everyone can use our app and enjoy in their time.
\n The vision of ViMux is to become a largest streaming app available for the users in the world.

• Professionalism 
 • Honesty 
 • Integrity 
 • Smart Work 
 • Respect 
 • Responsibility

• To provide good interface. 
 • To be budget friendly. 
 • To stream videos and music.

\n• The perfect team consists of people with varying skills and thinking.\n • We at ViMuX continue to believe this to be true and ensure we work the hardest to provide the possible content and interface to all our ViMuX active users.

• Soham is our in house coding expert who is specialized in android and php. 
 • He is the tech mind behind ViMuX. 
 • Soham is currently pursuing his MCA from Sinhgad Institute of Management and Computer Application.

• Sanskruti is our front end expertise in android. 
 • She is design mind behind ViMux. 
 • Sanskruti is currently pursuing MCA from Sinhgad Institute of Management and Computer Application.
